QuestData.Title: The Guo-Lai Halls
QuestData.Description: As you pass by the great door, you hear sounds from deep inside.$B$BAnji mentioned that advance mogu scouts had been sighted in this area. Perhaps they made their way down to the depths below.$B$BYour senses tingling, you decide to investigate.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the mogu presence in the Guo-Lai Halls.
